General/ATTDescription: This identifier will be used to measure advertising efficiency.

AdventureMenu/AskForHelp: Ask other players to revive you!
LoadingTips/Loading_Tip_3: I'll never financially recover from this...
LoadingTips/Loading_Tip_4: They don't think it be - but it do!
LoadingTips/Loading_Tip_5: Collect the same weapon again to refill ammo
LoadingTips/Loading_Tip_7: You can't win if you can't hit me
LoadingTips/Loading_Tip_8: Every weapon has its own special talent
FTUE/AttackDummy: Use your RIGHT THUMB to aim, drag and hold to attack
FTUE/CollectWeapon: You'll need a better weapon to succeed. <color=#85bbfc>Pick up the rifle!</color>
FTUE/EnterDeathmatch: <color=#85bbfc>Proceed to the Entrance</color> and join the Death Match!
FTUE/GoToExit: Now it's time to play the game for real - <color=#ff9700>Fight to win or die trying!</color>
FTUE/KillDummies: Drag and hold the SPECIAL button to aim and nuke the opponents
FTUE/KillDummy: Use your RIGHT THUMB to aim, drag and hold to attack
FTUE/MoveToArea: Use your LEFT THUMB to move to the Marked Area
FTUE/UseHammer: Good! <color=#ff9700>Drag Right Joystick to Attack</color> the training opponent
FTUE/UseJoystick: <color=#85bbfc>Drag Left Joystick to Move</color> to the Marked Area
FTUE/UseSpecial: <color=#ff9700>Use the weapon's special</color> attack to take down multiple opponents
FTUE/Welcome: Welcome contender. Let us begin your training.
FTUE/BPComplete: You completed the starting battle pass ! New rewards awaits you !
Tooltips/ToolTip_BLST:
Blast Tokens will be a valuable rewards obtained in special ways in-game, or purchased. 

Use Blast Tokens to purchase equipment on the marketplace.
Tooltips/ToolTip_BPP_pool:
Earn Blast Pass points in matches to claim rewards.

The pool of points refreshes over time.
Tooltips/ToolTip_CS:
Gain Craft Spice by placing higher in Ranked Battle Royale matches using NFTs.

Craft Spice is used on the Blast Hub for upgrading, repairing and replicating equipment.
Tooltips/ToolTip_CS_pool:
Gain Craft Spice in Ranked matches using NFTs.

Craft Spice pool refreshes over time.
Tooltips/ToolTip_Casual: You cannot earn rewards, or gain trophies in casual matches. Play for fun!
Tooltips/ToolTip_Coins:
Gain Coins by scrapping equipment.

Use Coins for upgrading and repairing your equipment.
Tooltips/ToolTip_NftCooldown:
This item was transferred recently.

Items on cooldown do not contribute to any in-game earnings.
Tooltips/ToolTip_Ranked: You can earn rewards in ranked matches, and your trophies are on the line. Play for glory!
Tooltips/ToolTip_Trophies:
Trophies increase your Craft Spice pool and move you higher in the Global Leadearboard.

Place higher in Ranked Battle Royale matches to earn trophies.
MainMenu/BattleRoyaleDescription: One life. Big map. Last player standing wins the match
MainMenu/BattlepassNothingToClaim: No rewards to claim. Play more games to unlock new rewards!
MainMenu/ConnectFirstLightIdAdvice: to secure your progress and unlock more features!
MainMenu/DeathmatchDescription: Infinite respawns. First player to reach the max kills wins.

Your account will be deleted soon. 
Your game will close now.

Are you sure you want to delete your account ? 
This cannot be undone.
MainMenu/DragAndReleaseToFireDescription: This weapon is fired by dragging and releasing the right side joystick.

MainMenu/HoldToFireDescription: Hold down the button to fire this weapon continuously.

MainMenu/LoginFirstLightId: Login to existing First Light ID

MainMenu/NotEnoughSpaceWarning: Are you sure? All extra Loot will be lost!

GameIds/BLSTDescription:
Blast Tokens will be a valuable
rewards obtained in special ways
in-game, or purchased. 

Use Blast Tokens to purchase
equipment on the marketplace.
GameIds/COINDescription:
Gain Coins by scrapping equipment.

Use Coins for upgrading
and repairing your equipment.
GameIds/CSDescription:
Gain Craft Spice by placing higher
in Ranked Battle Royale matches
using NFTs.

Craft Spice is used on the Blast Hub
for upgrading, repairing and
replicating equipment.
GameIds/DustyDesertDescription: An arid landscape with both riches and risks!
GameIds/FreewayDescription: The remanants of a bustling Freeway from the past
GameIds/HammerDescription: Nails enemies to the ground. No nails needed.
GameIds/LibertyDescription: A once famous landmark, reduced to rubble
GameIds/PhiladelphiaDescription: Once a busy city, now a looters battleground
GameIds/SpecialAggroBeaconGrenadeDescrip:
Attracts all enemies
around and explodes
after a few seconds.
GameIds/SpecialAimingAirstrikeDescriptio:
Deals splash damage
in a big area
GameIds/SpecialAimingGrenadeDescription:
Damages all enemies
within the blast radius
of a thrown grenade
GameIds/SpecialAimingHealAreaDescription:
Places a healing sphere
in a targetted position.
GameIds/SpecialAimingInvisibilityAreaDes:
All players within a
fixed area go Invisible.
GameIds/SpecialAimingRageAreaDescription:
All players within a fixed
area gain Rage status.
GameIds/SpecialAimingShieldAreaDescripti:
Places a shield which
all friendly players can use
GameIds/SpecialAimingStunGrenadeDescript:
Stuns all enemies within
the blast radius of a
thrown grenade
GameIds/SpecialAirstrikeSimpleDescriptio:
Deals splash damage
in a big area
GameIds/SpecialHealAroundDescription:
Heals all players
within a fixed area.
GameIds/SpecialHealingFieldDescription:
Heals all friendly players
within the healing field
GameIds/SpecialHealingModeDescription:
Heals any player targetted
by your weapon. Be a
team player!.
GameIds/SpecialInvisibilitySelfDescripti:
Go invisible, causing
enemies to stop targetting you.
GameIds/SpecialRadarDescription:
Shows nearby players
on the minimap
GameIds/SpecialRageSelfDescription:
Go into Rage mode and
inflict more damage per second.
GameIds/SpecialShieldSelfDescription:
Makes you invincible
and immune for some time
GameIds/SpecialShieldedChargeDescription:
Dash that damages enemies
on the way and grants shield
for the duration of the dash
GameIds/SpecialSkyLaserBeamDescription:
Almost instant high
power damage in a
small area
GameIds/SpecialStunSplashDescription:
Stuns all enemies
with a large area.
GameIds/StadiumDescription: A lively venue turned into a base of evil forces
GameIds/StadiumTrainingDescription: No hunting without a proper training
Marketplace/BuyInProcess: A buy transaction is in progress. You can't buy another item until the transaction finishes or is cancelled
Marketplace/BuyLootboxError: We were not able to conclude your BlastBox buy transaction
Marketplace/BuyLootboxSuccess: Congratulations. You have acquired a BlastBox!'
Marketplace/BuyNFTError: Something went wrong during the buy process
Marketplace/BuyNFTSuccess: You aquired a new piece of equipment! Check out your Inventory to view it!
Marketplace/BuyValidationProofError: Validation Proof error when trying to buy.
Marketplace/CancelInProcess: Cancel transaction in progress for this piece of equipment
Marketplace/CancelSellError: We were not able to cancel the equipment sale. Please try again
Marketplace/ChainAddError: Metamask failed to add chain network
Marketplace/ChainSwitchError: Metamask failed to switch chain network
Marketplace/CheckVestingAmountError: There was a technical issue when trying to retrieve vesting collection information.
Marketplace/CheckWalletLinkError: Was not possible to verify the wallet link with the account
Marketplace/ClaimVestingError: There was an issue when trying to claim your tokens. Please try again.
Marketplace/ClaimVestingNotAvailable: Claiming is currently unavailable. Try again later.
Marketplace/ClaimVestingScheduleError: Your schedule contract does not exist.
Marketplace/ClaimVestingSuccess: Congratulations! You just claimed your BLST tokens!!
Marketplace/CraftSpiceAvailabilityError: Unable to check if claim is available. Please try again later
Marketplace/CraftSpiceFetchError: There was an error fetching Craft Spice. Please try again
Marketplace/CraftSpiceMintError: Minting error. Nothing has been lost, but please try again
Marketplace/CraftSpiceMintOngoing: A craft spice request is already ongoing, please try again later
Marketplace/EthEventsError: Failed to add wallet events, please refresh the page
Marketplace/FetchBalanceError: Metamask failed to get the account balance
Marketplace/FetchNFTError: There was a problem fetching equipment to display
Marketplace/FetchNFTStatsError: There was a problem looking for current equipment stats.
Marketplace/HydrationError: There was an issue while initializing the Marketplace
Marketplace/InvalidNetwork: Connected to an invalid network. Please switch to the Polygon network.
Marketplace/LoginTransactionExists: You have one login request pending. Please, finalize this one first before requesting it again.
Marketplace/MerkleTreeGenerationError: Unable to generate your availability proof
Marketplace/NoBLSTPrice: This piece of equipment doesn't have a price available for it.
Marketplace/NoLinkedWallet: Please complete your registration and link your wallet to your game account. \n If you don't have one, click register.
Marketplace/NoWalletConnected: You need to connect your wallet first.
Marketplace/NotEnoughBLST: You don't have enough $BLST to complete this action.
Marketplace/OpenLootboxError: Unable to open Blastbox. Try again.
Marketplace/OpenLootboxMultipleTransacti: It can take time to open a Blastbox. Please be patient whilst they open.
Marketplace/PasswordResetRequestSuccess: We sent an email with further instructions on how reset your password
Marketplace/SellInProcess: A sale transaction is in progress. You can't sell another item until the transaction finishes or is cancelled
Marketplace/WalletLinkSuccess: Blast-tastic! Your wallet was successfully linked to your account.
